System.exitOnWindowClose

機能/意味
Whether to exit when the main window closes
タイプ
Systemクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates whether or not to close when the main window (the first instance of the Window class) closes. You can also set a value. Default is true.
　Note that if the main window is closed and no other debug-related windows are displayed, Kirikiri will remain on the system without quitting and may lose control. May be lost).
